const run = require('./test/util').run;

run(cmd => cmd.arg().name('qwe').end().arg().name('zxc').end().act(function(opts, args) { console.log({opts, args}); }), ['qwe', 'zxc']) // cmd and args .then(res => { // code // stdout // stderr console.log(res); });

 
run(cmd => cmd.opt().name('version').short('v').only().flag().act((opts) => { return 'aasd'; }), ['-v']) // cmd and args
    .then(res => {
